Text: O O̩jo̩, o̩la ki dʼefu-mi awo̩ mi, gbʼomu-mi ke;
Dʼumi maja bʼibe kʼamachʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ añwa umaja te̩,
abo ku ma fʼukpalu-ma no̩ dab o̩kwo̩chageli,
kʼama ki maja ata do e̩ne̩ ki mufu,
Ma dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw o̩la-ma ugbo e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ ku ma ñwa le̩;
Ma ñwʼibe e̩wñ bibi ku ma che;
Abe̩le̩ ma aje̩ ñw ma kʼe̩re̩, ukpalu-ma onugo akobʼuma;
